text: @Alyssa_Milano ...which is exactly why PRES.TRUMP IS A HERO for his bold, courageous, smart move to institute the travel ban, thereby saving untold lives and waking our country up-finally-from the fictionalized impeachment circus - to reality of the Covid-19 disaster.  Are you stupid or what?
